name: Worldlet (Demo)
description:
YOU! YOU ARE A WORLDLET! YOU HAVE A SUN THAT CAN SHOOT A SUNBEAM AND A MOON THAT FORMS A SHIELD. YOU ARE SURROUNDED BY AN  IMMENSE INDECIPHERABLE CHAOS THAT WILL UNMAKE YOU AND YOUR MOON AND YOUR SUN. NOT ONLY THAT BUT WORLDENDERS TOO! YOUR ONLY HOPE IS TO ESCAPE A TEAR IN REALITY TO A SAFER PLACE.

WASD to move.

Mouse to move your sun and moon.

Click to shoot sun and activate moon shield.

Made in less than a day because I have poor time management skills.
